titles: Discovery upon discovery in defence of Doctor Oates against B.W.'s libellous vindication of him, in his additional discovery, and in justification of L'Estrange against the same libell : in a letter to Doctor Titus Oates / by Roger L'Estrange.
author: L'Estrange, Roger, Sir, 1616-1704.
notes: Reproduction of original in Harvard University Library.
